entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Qualicum Beach
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:47 PM PST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Qualicum Beach Airport 01:00 AM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: 1.6°C
Humidity: 57 %
Dewpoint: -6.0°C
Wind: NW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
